00047 #ifndef MT_SCALAR_H
00048 #define MT_SCALAR_H
00049 
00050 #include <math.h>
00051 #include <float.h>
00052 
00053 #include "MT_random.h"
00054 #include "NM_Scalar.h"
00055 
00056 typedef double MT_Scalar; //this should be float !
00057 
00058 
00059 const MT_Scalar  MT_DEGS_PER_RAD(57.29577951308232286465);
00060 const MT_Scalar  MT_RADS_PER_DEG(0.01745329251994329547);
00061 const MT_Scalar  MT_PI(3.14159265358979323846);
00062 const MT_Scalar  MT_2_PI(6.28318530717958623200);
00063 const MT_Scalar  MT_EPSILON(1.0e-10);
00064 const MT_Scalar  MT_EPSILON2(1.0e-20);
00065 const MT_Scalar  MT_INFINITY(1.0e50);
00066 
00067 inline int       MT_sign(MT_Scalar x) {
00068     return x < 0.0 ? -1 : x > 0.0 ? 1 : 0;
00069 }
00070  
00071 inline MT_Scalar MT_abs(MT_Scalar x) { return fabs(x); }
00072 
00073 inline bool      MT_fuzzyZero(MT_Scalar x) { return MT_abs(x) < MT_EPSILON; }
00074 inline bool      MT_fuzzyZero2(MT_Scalar x) { return MT_abs(x) < MT_EPSILON2; }
00075 
00076 inline MT_Scalar MT_radians(MT_Scalar x) { 
00077     return x * MT_RADS_PER_DEG;
00078 }
00079 
00080 inline MT_Scalar MT_degrees(MT_Scalar x) { 
00081     return x * MT_DEGS_PER_RAD;
00082 }
00083 
00084 inline MT_Scalar MT_random() { 
00085     return MT_Scalar(MT_rand()) / MT_Scalar(MT_RAND_MAX);
00086 }
00087 
00088 inline MT_Scalar MT_clamp(const MT_Scalar x, const MT_Scalar min, const MT_Scalar max)
00089 {
00090     if (x < min)
00091         return min;
00092     else if (x > max)
00093         return max;
00094     return x;
00095 }
00096 #endif
